item.title: House passes final funding bills 8 days before shutdown, Senate now will consider
item.description: The Senate will still have to pass the measures when it returns to Washington next week.

item.title: Greenland PM: Don't know details of Trump-NATO deal framework, but sovereignty is a 'red line'
item.description: Nielsen criticized Trump's aggression toward Greenland, saying the rhetoric is "unacceptable."
